接口的使用
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.annotation.ModelAndViewResolver

  • 使用ModelAndViewResolver的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.annotation
    Support package for annotation-based Servlet MVC controllers.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation
    MVC infrastructure for annotation-based handler method processing, building on the org.springframework.web.method.annotation package.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.annotation中ModelAndViewResolver的使用

      参数类型为ModelAndViewResolver的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AnnotationMethodHandlerAdapter.setCustomModelAndViewResolver(ModelAndViewResolver customModelAndViewResolver)
      已过时。 
      Set a custom ModelAndViewResolvers to use for special method return types.
      void AnnotationMethodHandlerAdapter.setCustomModelAndViewResolvers(ModelAndViewResolver[] customModelAndViewResolvers)
      已过时。 
      Set one or more custom ModelAndViewResolvers to use for special method return types.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中ModelAndViewResolver的使用

      返回变量类型为ModelAndViewResolver的类型的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.List<ModelAndViewResolver> RequestMappingHandlerAdapter.getModelAndViewResolvers()
      Return the configured ModelAndViewResolvers, or null.
      类型变量类型为ModelAndViewResolver的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void RequestMappingHandlerAdapter.setModelAndViewResolvers(java.util.List<ModelAndViewResolver> modelAndViewResolvers)
      Provide custom ModelAndViewResolvers.
      类型变量类型为ModelAndViewResolver的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中的构造器参数 
      构造器和说明
      ModelAndViewResolverMethodReturnValueHandler(java.util.List<ModelAndViewResolver> mavResolvers)
      Create a new instance.
